name: Lost Lumberjack [Alpha Build]
description:
Lost Lumberjack

A horror game about a lumberjack that ran out of fuel in the woods. A mutated bear is hunting him while he tries finding two keys to enter an old villa. In the villa lives a professor who became crazy after synthesizing an anti-aging serum. Will he succeed escaping the house with a jerrycan of fuel without dying?

Explore the woods, explore multiple buildings, grab objects, throw objects, find keys, open doors and hide in wardrobes.

v0.1.1 fixes:

- Bear is faster

- Bear continues walking if it misses a jump

- Player can't sprint backwards.
